title: Agent Factory Central Dashboard (AFCD) — Design Blueprint
description: Comprehensive plan for the unified Agent Factory dashboard integrating real-time monitoring, agent orchestration, governance oversight, and conversational interface with Archy. Designed for scalability, reflection, and multi-tenant use.
objectives: Create a visually rich, real-time interactive hub for monitoring all Agent Factory operations.
Integrate live WebSocket feeds from backend services (Archy, Genesis, Governance, Knowledge, Federation).
Embed Archy as an interactive chat assistant accessible from any page.
Support movable cards and modular dashboards for future multi-company deployment.
Implement full-stack design with scalable backend and front-end technologies.

frontend.framework: React + TailwindCSS + Framer Motion + Shadcn/UI + Recharts
frontend.realtime: Socket.IO / WebSocket integration for live feeds.
frontend.deployment: Next.js or Vite build system with Render deploy.

layout.main_page: The Factory Floor overview page with draggable cards for each agent subsystem.

future_expansion.multi_tenant: Company profiles and workspace accounts with JWT access control.
future_expansion.ai_copilot: Archy auto-summarizes factory operations and ethical drift hourly.
future_expansion.timeline_replay: Animated playback of historical agent creation and system events.
future_expansion.reflective_mode: Displays Genesis learning progress and reflection metrics.
future_expansion.federation_analytics: Visual map of cross-factory insight exchange and drift levels.

tests: Verify all cards load and update in real-time.
Send test messages to Archy chatroom and confirm response.
Check WebSocket connections for all event feeds.
Confirm UI state persistence and layout drag behavior.
